Comment: It's very rare for a president the veto legislation coming out of a Congress wholly controlled by his own party. No, Biden hasn't vetoed anything because his allies have controlled Congress his entire presidency.

Comment: If you're interested, the last pocket veto was exercised [by Clinton](https://www.senate.gov/legislative/vetoes/vetoCounts.htm) on December 19, 2000. So it's been a while since we've seen one!
